Sandy_Springs.Atlanta Country Club:
Atlanta Country Club is a private golf club in the southeastern United States, located in Marietta, Georgia, a suburb northwest of Atlanta. The club was founded 54 years ago in 1964 and opened two years later.


== History ==
The Atlanta Country Club has had the distinction of hosting many golf tournaments over the years and most notably the Atlanta Classic on the PGA Tour for 29 years (1967–1996).
